Shh! Secret Restaurant Menus
Fast-food places have plenty of little-known options By Evann Gastaldo , Newser Staff Posted Mar 6, 2010 12:50 PM CST STORY COMMENTS (16)
(Newser) – In-N-Out Burger’s“secret menu”(veggie burgers, etc.) has gotten way too famous to really be considered a secret anymore—but Coupon Sherpa rounds up little-known items at other fast-food joints: Chili’s : Though it’s not on the menu anymore, you can in fact still order the restaurant’s namesake dish. Long John Silvers : Ask for a side of crumbs and you’ll get—for free—a box of fried batter parts that fell off the fish or chicken.
Jamba Juice : This secret menu is still pretty secret, but it includes a drink with the title“Pink Starburst.” Chipotle : They’ll make an item with any combination of ingredients they have—a quesorito is a quesadilla with burrito fillings, rolled up and baked. McDonald's : If you can bring yourself to order a McGangBang, you’ll get a double cheeseburger with a chicken patty sandwiched in between the beef patties. Starbucks : A Cake Batter Frappucino is a vanilla frappucino with almond and vanilla bean flavoring. For the complete list, click here .
In-N-Out Burger actually posts its "secret menu" on its website now. (Flickr)
